mapper.select: SELECT dfv.real_name, dfv.diet_date, fnv.nutrient_name, ROUND(SUM(dfv.quantity / 100.0 * fnv.amount), 2) AS intake_amount, ns.recommend_amount, ns.unit, CASE WHEN ROUND(SUM(dfv.quantity / 100.0 * fnv.amount), 2) >= ns.recommend_amount THEN '是' ELSE '否' END AS is_sufficient FROM diet_food_view dfv JOIN food_nutrient_view fnv ON dfv.food_name = fnv.food_name JOIN nutrient_standard ns ON ns.nutrient_id = fnv.nutrient_id WHERE ns.gender = #{gender} AND #{age} BETWEEN ns.age_min AND ns.age_max AND dfv.diet_date = #{dietDate} AND ns.pregnancy = #{pregnancy} AND ns.lactation = #{lactation} GROUP BY dfv.real_name, dfv.diet_date, fnv.nutrient_name, ns.recommend_amount, ns.unit
